This is the pin to wear to show your support for awarenesses and causes such as Leukemia, Multiple Sclerosis, Kidney Cancer, Hunger, Cultural Diversity, and Racial Tolerance.

description: This is the pin to wear to show your support for awarenesses and causes such as Leukemia, Multiple Sclerosis, Kidney Cancer, Hunger, Cultural Diversity, and Racial Tolerance. Our HOPE Pin with Orange Ribbon Charm measures 1-1/4"W x 7/16"H, highlights a cut-out design, struck from premium jeweler's metal, white enamel color filled and nickel plated. It features a dangling awareness ribbon from the O, which measures 3/4"H x 1/4"W, is also a cut-out design, is orange enamel color filled and nickel plated. This presentation includes a safety pin back, allowing this brooch style to stay in perfect place on your garment. It comes to you individually poly bagged. This pin is a great symbol to wear on your lanyard, lapel, purse strap and ID Badge. Each comes to you individually poly bagged.
